## CookieJar.getCookiesSync() method

Synchronously retrieve the list of cookies that can be sent in a Cookie header for the current URL.

<strong>Note</strong>: Only works if the configured Store is also synchronous.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCookiesSync(url: string, options?: GetCookiesOptions): Cookie[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

url


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The domain to store the cookie with.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[GetCookiesOptions](./tough-cookie.getcookiesoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Configuration settings to use when retrieving the cookies.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Cookie](./tough-cookie.cookie.md)<!-- -->\[\]

## Remarks

- The array of cookies returned will be sorted according to [cookieCompare()](./tough-cookie.cookiecompare.md)<!-- -->.

- The [Cookie.lastAccessed](./tough-cookie.cookie.lastaccessed.md) property will be updated on all returned cookies.
